description: Fantastic course! A variety of shots, very challenging. Work is still in progress, so I expect it to be better and better. Reminiscent of a John Houck design.
A great hike, first of all, and the course is taking shape as a top-notch option on PEI. Very tough to beat this beauty of a course‚Ä¶ a nature-loving disc golfer‚Äôs dream.

It‚Äôs a very well designed course. I cannot wait to see what it develops into when the fairways grow in and the footing allows for run ups. My feet are small and I was worried about rolling ankles so did standstill throwing after the tee. Beautiful course. I find it hard to believe that it only opened in 2022!
Best on the island. Top drawer.
PEI's newest gem! Great layout with some fun lines. I loved it and can't wait to go back soon! Now even better with both red and blue tee locations! üëç
